predicate.note: Frames file for 'lap' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Ingestion.

roleset.name: apply the tongue to gently

example.name: intransitive (and metaphorical)
example.text: The breezes are soft, the waves lap gently and the palm trees sway lazily.

example.name: transitive (and literal)
example.text: John's kitten lapped at the saucer of milk.

roleset.note: Also a phrasal variant 'lap up' implying completion of the process, but otherwise taking the same PAS.
